testcase.name: Login with correct credential
testcase.system-out: When User goes to login page................................................passed Then User enters correct username-password..................................passed And User clicks on login....................................................passed Then logged in successfully.................................................passed

testcase.name: Login with wrong credential
testcase.system-out: When User goes to the login page............................................passed When user enters wrong username-password....................................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then failed login...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Test right clicks on the context menu.
testcase.system-out: When User goes to the context menu..........................................passed And User does the right clicks in the box...................................passed Then User sees Alert popped up and click....................................passed And The right click page displayed..........................................passed

testcase.name: Test drags element A to element B.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the drag and drop page...................................passed When user drags A to drop B.................................................passed Then user sees A and B is switched..........................................passed

Given User goes to the DropDown page........................................passed When User can select Option1 and see is selected............................passed Then User can select Option2 and see is selected...........................passed

testcase.name: Test refreshes the page a couple of times.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the Dynamic content page.................................passed When User clicks on the click here for Dynamic content changes..............passed Then User can see content changes on each refresh...........................passed

testcase.name: Click on the Remove/add button either of one is presented
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the Dynamic Controls page................................passed When User clicks on the Remove Button and uses explicit wait................passed Then User asserts that the checkbox is gone.................................passed And User clicks on Add Button and uses explicit wait........................passed Then User asserts that the checkbox is present..............................passed

testcase.name: Dynamic Loading progresses
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the dynamic loading page.................................passed When User clicks the start button and uses explicit wait....................passed Then User Asserts that “Hello World!” text is displayed.....................passed

testcase.name: Clicks on the file.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the file download page...................................passed When User clicks the some-file.txt..........................................passed Then user can see it is downloaded..........................................passed

testcase.name: Use Upload Button or Drag and Drop to upload a file.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the file upload page.....................................passed When User clicks choose file button and select..............................passed And User clicks the upload button...........................................passed Then User can see File is Uploaded!.........................................passed

testcase.name: Test scrolls the page.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the Floating Menu page...................................passed When User scrolls the page..................................................passed Then The floating menu is still displayed...................................passed

testcase.name: Test switches to Iframe and types some text.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the iframe page..........................................passed When User types in the iframe text box......................................passed Then The typed text is as expected..........................................passed

testcase.name: Test does a mouse hover on each image.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the Mouse Hover page.....................................passed When User can does mouse hover on each image................................passed Then User can see Additional information is displayed for each image........passed

testcase.name: Test Clicks on JS Alert Button.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the alert page...........................................passed When User clicks on JS Alert Button alert message displayed.................passed And User clicks on JS confirm Button and clicks ok on alert.................passed Then Verify new alert message is displayed..................................passed When User clicks on JS Prompt Button and types a message on Prompt..........passed Then the alert message contains the typed message...........................passed

testcase.name: Test finds the JavaScript error on the page.
testcase.system-out: When User goes to the JavaScript Error page.................................passed Then User can see asserts that the page contains error......................passed

testcase.name: Test clicks on the Click Here link.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes in the Open in new Tap page.................................passed When User clicks on the Click Here link.....................................passed Then User asserts that a new tab is opened with text New Window.............passed

testcase.name: Test clicks on the Click Here link a multiple times.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the Notification Message Page...........................passed When User clicks on the Click Here link a multiple times....................passed
